anathema: Steal another artisan’s design, participate in an arranged marriage
edict: Develop a signature style, express yourself through craft, provide necessities and protection for those in need
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Yelayne (The Wind Weaver)](/Deities.aspx?ID=630)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 5

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Develop a signature style, express yourself through craft, provide necessities and protection for those in need

**Anathema** Steal another artisan’s design, participate in an arranged marriage

**Area of Concern**
Clothing, craftspeople, security, self-expression

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37)

**Favored Weapon** [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=367)

**Domains** [Air](/Domains.aspx?ID=65), [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=122)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=67), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=93)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Phantasmal Minion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1631)

- **3rd**
[Cozy Cabin](/Spells.aspx?ID=1474)

- **6th**
[Vibrant Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=1741)

</column>
name: Yelayne (The Wind Weaver)
